title: The life and legend of Florence Nightingale
itunes:title: The life and legend of Florence Nightingale
itunes:subtitle: Mark Bostridge reflects on the pioneering Victorian nurse’s work at the Crimean War and beyond. Historyextra.com/podcast
description:
On the 200th anniversary of Florence Nightingale’s birth, biographer Mark Bostridge reflects on the pioneering Victorian nurse’s work at the Crimean War and beyond. Historyextra.com/podcast

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
